## WorkerBasedDecoder.decodeTile() method

Get \[\[Tile\]\] from tile decoder service in worker.

Invokes \[\[DecodeTileRequest\]\] on \[\[TileDecoderService\]\] running in worker pool.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
decodeTile(data: ArrayBufferLike, tileKey: TileKey, projection: Projection, requestController?: RequestController): Promise<DecodedTile>;
```
